item.description:
We can get outside if the weather is nice!!! I can set up two topropes, Let me know in your RSVP if you can set up some. Also let me know if anyone needs a ride.

Thursday - Weather looks good with temps in the 60s and no rain. I plan to get their early, by 8:30, to grab a spot. I will send an email on friday with my cell # so you all can call me when you get to the cliffs. Also, give me a call or send me an email if you need a ride, or post a message on this board.

You should at least have yours own harness and shoes. It looks like we will have enough ropes. I would prefer if everyone has at least taken the basic belay class at a local gym. If you are an absolutely brand new climber with no experience or gear whatsoever, please send me an email to see if we can fit you in.  

This is a good place for beginners who have climbed at a gym but never climbed outside before.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a red down coat. I may not be wearing it but I will put in on my backpack. I will email everyone my cell#.
item.name: The Climbing Season begins at Quincy
